short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatGPT answers next to Google search results. Works with other search engines as well.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
View ChatGPT generated responses alongside search engine results!

ChatGPT Google Search Assistant is a handy addition to your regular web searches: it displays ChatGPT answers next to your Google search results. 
Enter your question in the Google search bar, and ChatGPT will promptly provide you with answers and suggestions displayed next to your Google search results. 

It's a big time saver: two in one without a need to change a website to chat.openai.com and repeat your question there! This free and convenient tool offers quick access to Chat GPT's advanced AI capabilities directly from your search engine. 

The extension also works with Bing, DuckDuckGo and Yahoo!
